projects.title: Social Network for Food Rescue
projects.description: We've developed a React Native application tailored for food rescue, seamlessly integrated with Firebase for backend support. Our platform empowers users to share surplus food donations conveniently displayed on a map for easy access, by prioritizing user-friendliness and efficienc

projects.title: Recruitment Management Website
projects.description: Developed a TypeScript and React-powered website for the 'Gvanim' association, simplifying employee recruitment. With Firebase handling the backend, candidates can seamlessly submit resumes while recruiters efficiently manage job listings, interviews, and candidate status.

projects.title: Personal portfolio
projects.description: This personal portfolio showcases my skills and projects as a software developer. Built with Next.js and React, it emphasizes responsive design and modern aesthetics using CSS Modules. The site features project displays, a skills list, and a CV download option, leveraging Full Stack development for a seamless and fast user experience.
